Email Notification for expiry Bank Guarantee

Dear ${ctx.get('customer_name')}


As valued customers, we would like to remind you that your bank guarantee is approaching its expiration date. The bank guarantee is set to expire on ${ctx.get('expiry_date')}, which is just around the corner.


Please take note of this expiration date to ensure that you are aware of the upcoming end of your bank guarantee period. Once the bank guarantee expires, its associated benefits and protections will no longer be available.


Thank you for your attention to this matter. Should you require any assistance or have any queries, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.


Best regards,

Dear ${ctx.get('vendor_name')},


I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to claim the promotional for ${ctx.get('res_name')}.

I have attached a file to this email, containing the details of the promo that i am claiming.


Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter. We would greatly appreciate your feedback regarding the promotional claim we made.

Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.
